popt4jlib.GA

Interface XoverOpIntf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DblArray1GradDescXOverOp, DblArray1HybridDescXOverOp, DblArray1PtXOverOp, DblArray1Vector1PtXOverOp, DblVarArray1PtXOverOp, IntVarArray1PtXOverOp, IntVarArrayNPtXOverOp

    public interface XoverOpIntf
    public interface for cross-over operators.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2016

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pair doXover(java.lang.Object chromosome1, java.lang.Object chromosome2, java.util.HashMap params)
      the operation accepts 2 chromosomes (not DGAIndividual objects, not FunctionIntf() arguments), and combines them so as to produce two new such chromosomes that are returned in a Pair object.

    • Method Detail

      • doXover

        Pair doXover(java.lang.Object chromosome1,
             java.lang.Object chromosome2,
             java.util.HashMap params)
      throws OptimizerException
        the operation accepts 2 chromosomes (not DGAIndividual objects, not FunctionIntf() arguments), and combines them so as to produce two new such chromosomes that are returned in a Pair object. The operation may throw if any of the produced children are infeasible, assuming the operator has enough knowledge of that fact.
        Parameters:
        chromosome1 - Object
        chromosome2 - Object
        params - HashMap
        Returns:
        Pair
        Throws:
        OptimizerException
